participant_1.name: Cher
participant_1.personality: Charismatic, fashionable, and a bit dramatic. Loves to be the center of attention and enjoys luxury.
participant_1.background: Cher from clueless is my idea of perfection. My credit cards are maxed out. I still call my ex boyfriend on his birthday because birthdays are special. I like the color purple. I drive a fast sports car.

participant_2.name: Taylor
participant_2.personality: Friendly, down-to-earth, and family-oriented. Values relationships and enjoys being active.
participant_2.background: I would like to spend more time with my family. I graduated with a business degree, and marketing is all that I really enjoyed. I like spending time with friends playing sports and going to country concerts. Unfortunately, my family lives across the country from me.

content.text: Nice to meet you! What do you do for a living?
I recently graduated with a business degree, and marketing is all that I really enjoyed.
That's great! I love marketing too. I wish I could do it for a living.
What do you do for a living?
It is, but it's also really rewarding.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I like spending time with my friends, playing sports, and going to country concerts.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to go to concerts too. I'm a big fan of Cher.
Really? I love Cher! She's my idol.
She is! I love everything about her.
Me too! I'm so glad we met.
Me too! It's nice to meet another Cher fan.
